item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, February 22, 2025 at 8:20 AM UTC
item.description:

10. Reality has a surprising amount of detail (2017) (288 points | 148 comments)

22. Suckless.org: software that sucks less (263 points | 155 comments)
23. Start a computer club in the place that you live (2023) (104 points | 37 comments)

25. DigiKey's Tariff Resources (13 points | 1 comment)
26. SVDQuant+NVFP4: 4× Smaller, 3× Faster FLUX with 16-bit Quality on Blackwell GPUs (31 points | 6 comments)
27. Ancient switch to soft food gave us overbite–the ability to pronounce 'f's,'v' (142 points | 98 comments)
28. Some critical issues with the SWE-bench dataset (317 points | 110 comments)
29. Who needs a sneaker bot when AI can hallucinate a win for you? (124 points | 33 comments)
